summary: This is a Conversion of Nimezis's Hunting Grounds Outfit for the Demon Fet Body
descriptionHtml:
I encourage everyone to PLEASE!!! upload your ScreenShots.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/u3popun.png[/img]
This is a SeveNBase Based Conversion of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30466/?]Nimezis's Hunting Grounds Outfit[/url] for the Demon Fet Body
The Demon Fet Body is a skinner more well endowed version of the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase[/url] BombShell.

it is TBBP-BBP compatible, with Working weight Slider. Make sure you install the proper requirements listed below
all the elements from the Original Mod are left intact, only the Female meshes were altered to fit the Demon Fet Body.
[b][i][color=#ff0000][size=3]
To aquire the Outfit:[/size][/color][/i][/b]
The Outfit can be crafted at the SkyForge under "[u]Leather[/u]" category between [color=#00ff00]11PM[/color] & [color=#00ff00]12AM [/color]
But ONLY if you've completed Hircine's Quest "[color=#9900ff][size=3][i][u]Ill Met By Moonlight[/u][/i][/size][/color]"



[img]https://i.imgur.com/oQhwEBV.png[/img]
[i][b][color=#ff7700][size=4]Requires Version[/size][/color]:[/b][/i] [i][b][size=3][color=#cc4125]18.151.0.7[/color][color=#00ff00]+ [/color][color=#cc4125]DAWNGUARD
[/color][/size][/b][/i][color=#ff7700]
[b][i][size=4][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/kt4n8a51o8036be/Demon+Fet+Body+%26+-LABIA-.7z][color=#ff7700]Demon Fet Body[/color][/url] [/size][/i][/b][/color]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77163/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D77163%26preview%3D&pUp=1]DeMoNhUnTeR1986
[/url]The Body isn't necessarily required but is here for anyone who might want to try this body out.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?][b][i][color=#ff7700][size=4]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended -XPMSE-[/size][/color][/i][/b][/url]  By [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3350373/?]Groovtama[/url]

If you for any reason have issues with the xp32 skeletons try downloading [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/m6h7o7irdj5pm43/Zquad1%27s+Skeleton+for++Demon+Fet+Body.7z#39;s_Skeleton_for__Demon_Fet_Body.7z]My Skeleton[/url] & you shouldn't have anymore issues.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/hyKTPfg.png[/img]
These are loose files so you will need to install this manually now you can install through NMM but I don't include the FOMOD file.

so just drop the files into your Skyrim directory. the file path for that is  C:/Programs(x86)/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data.
Now Activate the .ESP by clicking on the "SkyrimLauncher.exe" then Exit out of the Launcher & then click on Loot to finish the activation.
if you need Loot Click here---> [url=https://github.com/loot/loot/releases/tag/0.9.1]LOOT
[/url]                                      [img]https://s20.postimg.org/g8llfh1jh/Signature_Final1.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/eV272UF.png[/img]
[url=http://www.bethsoft.com/][color=#ff7700]Bethesda[/color][/url]                  [i]For the Awesome game.[/i][url=http://www.bethsoft.com/age]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30466/?][color=#ff7700]Nimezis[/color][/url]                    For the Awesome outfit.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3496215/?][color=#ff7700]anano[/color][/url]                       For the Maxwell Outfit.
[color=#ff7700][color=#ff7700][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605/?][color=#ff7700]CaBal120[/color][/url]                  [/color][/color]For the Fur, Gloves, & Boot Textures.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/821197/?][color=#ff7700]DJM017[/color][/url][color=#ff7700]                     [/color]For the Pauldron & Tail From his Tera Armors.
[color=#ff7700]Lordofwar[/color]                 For the Amulet (Wolf Head) From  Witcher 2 Models.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2689072/?][color=#ff7700]zzjay[/color][/url][color=#ff7700]                        [/color]For Applying Apachii Hair to the Hood.
[color=#ff7700][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283148/?][color=#ff7700]Apachii[/color][/url]                     [/color]For her Skyhair Mod.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5251077/?][color=#ff7700]DeMoNhUnTeR 1986[/color][/url]  For the Demon Fet Body.

                                             Must first Get Permission from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/572584/?][color=#ff7700]Nimezis[/color][/url] for any altering & Uploading of this mod.
author: Nimezis
